name: part_001
file: tmp_【3D Showcase】 Yes, a squirrel can be an Idol, too #AyundaRisu3D【Ayunda Risu ⧸ hololive ID 】 [VxnwBm49egM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Ayunda Risu greets the audience and talks about her first 3D showcase.
Cinematic transition sequence showing a rainy city street and then moving into a bedroom.
Ayunda Risu appears inside her bedroom, emerging from a box.
